jumbotronSubTitle: We like to keep you up to date with who we are and what we're about
jumbotronSubSubTitle: Scroll down to find out more.

safety.heading1: Practices, Standards and Health And Safety
safety.headingText1: Certified Welding goes the extra mile to make sure our services, products and safety meet the highest standards. Here's how we do it.

items.headingText1: Certified Welding employs a full-time health and safety manager.
Certified Welding is member of site safe New Zealand.
We regularly get our equipment tested and certified.
Our staff go through comprehensive training so they can do their jobs effectively and safely.
Certified Welding is a member of Heavy Engineering Research Association of New Zealand.
All of Certified Weldingâ€™s work is in accordance with AS/NZS 5131:2016.

community.headingText1: We like to keep active in our community by donating to charities and sponsoring clubs. Check out how we get involved.

about.headingText1: Our workshop is located in the industrial sector of Auckland's East Tamaki.
about.headingText2: Certified Welding was established in 1973 and has been operating for the past 45 Years! The current managing director is a 3rd generation family member to be proudly at the helm.
